Distribution.description: The distributions of the distribution configuration.

properties.name: Region
properties.description: region

type.description: region

properties.name: LicenseConfigurationArns
properties.description: The License Manager Configuration to associate with the AMI in the specified Region.

type.description: The License Manager Configuration to associate with the AMI in the specified Region.

properties.name: LaunchTemplateConfigurations
properties.description: A group of launchTemplateConfiguration settings that apply to image distribution.

type.description: A group of launchTemplateConfiguration settings that apply to image distribution.

properties.name: FastLaunchConfigurations
properties.description: The Windows faster-launching configurations to use for AMI distribution.

type.description: The Windows faster-launching configurations to use for AMI distribution.

AmiDistributionConfiguration.description: The specific AMI settings (for example, launch permissions, AMI tags).

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the AMI distribution configuration.

type.description: The name of the AMI distribution configuration.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: The KMS key identifier used to encrypt the distributed image.

type.description: The KMS key identifier used to encrypt the distributed image.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the AMI distribution configuration.

type.description: The description of the AMI distribution configuration.

properties.name: AmiTags
properties.description: The tags to apply to AMIs distributed to this Region.

type.description: The tags to apply to AMIs distributed to this Region.

properties.name: TargetAccountIds
properties.description: The ID of accounts to which you want to distribute an image.

type.description: The ID of accounts to which you want to distribute an image.

ContainerDistributionConfiguration.description: Container distribution settings for encryption, licensing, and sharing in a specific Region.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the container distribution configuration.

type.description: The description of the container distribution configuration.

properties.name: ContainerTags
properties.description: Tags that are attached to the container distribution configuration.

type.description: Tags that are attached to the container distribution configuration.

properties.name: TargetRepository
properties.description: The destination repository for the container distribution configuration.

type.description: The destination repository for the container distribution configuration.

LaunchTemplateConfiguration.description: launchTemplateConfiguration settings that apply to image distribution.

properties.name: LaunchTemplateId
properties.description: Identifies the EC2 launch template to use.

type.description: Identifies the EC2 launch template to use.

properties.name: AccountId
properties.description: The account ID that this configuration applies to.

type.description: The account ID that this configuration applies to.

properties.name: SetDefaultVersion
properties.description: Set the specified EC2 launch template as the default launch template for the specified account.

type.description: Set the specified EC2 launch template as the default launch template for the specified account.

FastLaunchConfiguration.description: The Windows faster-launching configuration to use for AMI distribution.

properties.name: AccountId
properties.description: The owner account ID for the fast-launch enabled Windows AMI.

type.description: The owner account ID for the fast-launch enabled Windows AMI.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: A Boolean that represents the current state of faster launching for the Windows AMI. Set to true to start using Windows faster launching, or false to stop using it.

type.description: A Boolean that represents the current state of faster launching for the Windows AMI. Set to true to start using Windows faster launching, or false to stop using it.

properties.name: LaunchTemplate
properties.description: The launch template that the fast-launch enabled Windows AMI uses when it launches Windows instances to create pre-provisioned snapshots.

type.description: The launch template that the fast-launch enabled Windows AMI uses when it launches Windows instances to create pre-provisioned snapshots.

properties.name: MaxParallelLaunches
properties.description: The maximum number of parallel instances that are launched for creating resources.

type.description: The maximum number of parallel instances that are launched for creating resources.

properties.name: SnapshotConfiguration
properties.description: Configuration settings for managing the number of snapshots that are created from pre-provisioned instances for the Windows AMI when faster launching is enabled.

type.description: Configuration settings for managing the number of snapshots that are created from pre-provisioned instances for the Windows AMI when faster launching is enabled.

LaunchPermissionConfiguration.description: Launch permissions can be used to configure which AWS accounts can use the AMI to launch instances.

properties.name: UserIds
properties.description: The AWS account ID.

type.description: The AWS account ID.

properties.name: UserGroups
properties.description: The name of the group.

type.description: The name of the group.

properties.name: OrganizationArns
properties.description: The ARN for an Amazon Web Services Organization that you want to share your AMI with.

type.description: The ARN for an Amazon Web Services Organization that you want to share your AMI with.

properties.name: OrganizationalUnitArns
properties.description: The ARN for an Organizations organizational unit (OU) that you want to share your AMI with.

type.description: The ARN for an Organizations organizational unit (OU) that you want to share your AMI with.

LicenseConfigurationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the License Manager configuration.

TargetContainerRepository.description: The destination repository for the container image.

properties.name: Service
properties.description: The service of target container repository.

type.description: The service of target container repository.

properties.name: RepositoryName
properties.description: The repository name of target container repository.

type.description: The repository name of target container repository.

FastLaunchLaunchTemplateSpecification.description: The launch template that the fast-launch enabled Windows AMI uses when it launches Windows instances to create pre-provisioned snapshots.

properties.name: LaunchTemplateId
properties.description: The ID of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

type.description: The ID of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

properties.name: LaunchTemplateName
properties.description: The name of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

type.description: The name of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

properties.name: LaunchTemplateVersion
properties.description: The version of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

type.description: The version of the launch template to use for faster launching for a Windows AMI.

FastLaunchSnapshotConfiguration.description: Configuration settings for managing the number of snapshots that are created from pre-provisioned instances for the Windows AMI when faster launching is enabled.

properties.name: TargetResourceCount
properties.description: The number of pre-provisioned snapshots to keep on hand for a fast-launch enabled Windows AMI.

type.description: The number of pre-provisioned snapshots to keep on hand for a fast-launch enabled Windows AMI.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the distribution configuration.

type.description: The name of the distribution configuration.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the distribution configuration.

type.description: The description of the distribution configuration.

properties.name: Distributions
properties.description: The distributions of the distribution configuration.

type.description: The distributions of the distribution configuration.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags associated with the component.

type.description: The tags associated with the component.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the distribution configuration.
